channel.title: Client Help Please
channel.description: Hi, i have downloaded a few clients for moparscape that allow u to play private servers such as Satans Isle, Earthscape and more. Im wondering how do i get these to run the actual IP i want? i have gotten them to run Hybrid scape but how do i get them to run others? Help plz :o

item.title: Client Help Please
item.dc:creator: @Von_Luva Von Luva
item.description:
@Von_Luva wrote:

no i mean, i downloaded the Satans Isle client and i wanna know how to get the satans isle to work. not other servers

Read full topic

item.title: Client Help Please
item.dc:creator: @Play_N_Skillz Play N Skillz
item.description:
@Play_N_Skillz wrote:

Mod Tainted:

u cant u can only get those to run there own i.p.'s if u want to play other servers…u need the regular mopar client

Omg , Mod… Shows how much you know… You can get your own I.P. by getting an online webhoster. Or, can add and host a no-ip address at www.no-ip.com

Read full topic
